title: CSS Selectors
description: Apply styles using element, class, and ID selectors.

examples.input:
<style>
  p { color: blue; }
  .highlight { background: yellow; }
  #special { font-size: 20px; }
</style>
examples.output: Paragraphs turn blue, elements with class highlight get yellow background, and element with ID special has larger text.

constraints: Use element, class, and ID selectors.
Each selector must apply a visible style.
starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <style>
    /* your CSS here */
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- your elements here -->
</body>
</html>
